effect_entries.effect: Trade one to the Move Relearner near the shore in pastoria city or with the Move Deleter in blackthorn city to teach one party Pokémon a prior level-up move.
effect_entries.short_effect: No effect. Can be traded for prior Level-up moves.

flavor_text_entries.text:
有着美丽心形外形
且非常珍稀的鳞片。
有些人收到会很高兴。

きれいな　ハートの　形の
とても　珍しい　ウロコ。
渡すと　よろこぶ　人もいる。

A pretty, heart-shaped scale that is extremely
rare. Some people are happy to receive one.

Squama graziosa, a forma di cuore e molto rara.
Alcune persone sono molto felici di riceverne una.

Una bella y rara escama con forma de corazón que
más de uno apreciará si se la entregas.

Eine hübsche, herzförmige und sehr seltene
Schuppe. Damit könnte man so manchem eine
Freude machen.

Une écaille très rare et jolie en forme de cœur.
Certaines personnes sont ravies quand on leur
en donne une.

有著美麗心形外形
且非常稀奇的鱗片。
有些人收到會很高興。

예쁜 하트 모양의
무척 진귀한 비늘.
받으면 좋아하는 사람도 있다.

きれいな　ハートの　かたちの
とても　めずらしい　ウロコ。
わたすと　よろこぶ　ひともいる。

きれいな　ハートの　形の
とても　珍しい　ウロコ。
にじ色に　うすく　輝く。

A pretty, heart-shaped scale that is
extremely rare. It glows faintly with
all of the colors of the rainbow.

Squama graziosa, a forma di cuore e molto rara.
Riflette tutti i colori dell’iride.

Bella escama con forma de corazón que brilla
ligeramente como los colores del arcoíris. Es muy
poco común.

Eine hübsche, herzförmige und sehr seltene
Schuppe. Sie erstrahlt in den Farben
des Regenbogens.

Une très rare et jolie écaille en forme de cœur.
Elle brille légèrement d’un éclat arc-en-ciel.

예쁜 하트 모양의
무척 진귀한 비늘.
무지개색으로 연하게 반짝인다.

きれいな　ハートの　かたちの
とても　めずらしい　ウロコ。
にじいろに　うすく　かがやく。

A pretty, heart-shaped scale that is
extremely rare. It glows faintly in the
colors of the rainbow.

A pretty, heart-shaped scale that is
extremely rare. It glows faintly in the
colors of the rainbow.

Une jolie écaille en forme de cœur qui
est très rare. Elle brille légèrement
d’un éclat arc-en-ciel.

A pretty, heart-shaped scale that is
extremely rare. It glows faintly in the
colors of the rainbow.

A pretty, heart-shaped scale that is
extremely rare. It glows faintly in the
colors of the rainbow.

A pretty, heart-shaped scale that is
extremely rare. It glows faintly in the
colors of the rainbow.

A pretty, heart-shaped scale that
is extremely rare. It glows faintly
in the colors of a rainbow.

A lovely scale.
It is coveted by
collectors.

A lovely scale.
It is coveted by
collectors.
